Item.text: Create virtual serial port using HHD Software Free Virtual Serial Ports.
Make this port available on a remote computer using HHD Software Remote Serial Ports Server.
Make a remote serial port available on this computer using HHD Software Remote Serial Ports Client.
In order to start monitoring, locate the serial, USB or network device you want to monitor in the [[[v#[toolwindow.devices]# ]]] [[[hDevices Tool Window]]] and double-click it.
